headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About AppLovin (APP): Should You Buy?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for AppLovin (APP) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Rise On Solid Global Growth And Rate Doubts
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Monday, Jan, 5 2026 US stock futures are pointing higher this morning, with E-mini S&P 500 contracts up about 0.25% and Nasdaq 100 futures ahead roughly 0.55%, as investors weigh strong global growth pockets against interest rate questions. Vietnam just reported Q4 2025 GDP growth of 8.46% and full year growth of 8.02%. This signals healthy demand for goods, travel and services that many US multinationals sell abroad.
